stem.text:
Complete the sentences below to express criticism. Use the third conditional and the cues in brackets. Write the full B response (full sentence) in the field below each question.
Example)
A) I was only just able to brake in time when a deer ran out in front of me. (drive more slowly)
B) If you’d been driving more slowly, you wouldn’t have had to brake so suddenly.

A) I hit my head on the windscreen when I stopped. (wear a seatbelt)
B) You ____.

A) We set off a bit late and got held up in the traffic. (leave earlier)
B) If you ____ in the traffic.

A) We got stuck on a mountain because a heavy fog suddenly came down. (check weather forecast)
B) If ____ on a mountain in the fog.

A) I went to get a coffee and lost all the work I was doing. (save the document)
B) You ____.

A) I was doing something else so I didn't hear what she said. (pay attention)
B) If ____ what she said.
